website_summaries.verdict: This thick-cut jerky has a mild taste and no added sugar.
pros: This jerky eliminates all preservatives or artificial ingredients
Long shelf life of up to a year
cons: While this product is natural, it is not made with grass-fed beef

customer_reviews.title: Gross moldy! Unacceptable..
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this multiple times as a Keto snack to stay on my low carb high fat diet and I’ve always enjoyed it and never received a bad batch until now!!! I kept the bag at my office and have been snacking on it little by little over the last week and today I reached all the way in and discovered most of it covered in green mold!!!!!🤢🤮. I think I’m going to be sick... and I’ve been eating a lot of it today and wasn’t looking at what I was grabbing while on phone calls so I literally probably will get very sick! So gross!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: FidgetsMama

customer_reviews.title: This was my favorite jerky & even bought direct from seller once.
customer_reviews.text: The 1st time I purchased this jerky on here, I was in heaven. It was my fav jerky and awesome for a keto low carb lifestyle. I then bought it from their main site to see if there was any difference and it was good, but not as awesome as the first time on here. Then I purchased it through here again, and it was like a totally different jerky than the other times. Really thin and fatty/greasy/slimy pieces that still tasted hard and almost stale. For the price it was a huge disappointment especially since it is costly so I bought it as a treat for me at Christmas time again.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Dry and dusty
customer_reviews.text: Has no flavor and very dry compared to a lot of other jerky disgusted with my purchase some pieces crumble in your hand some just plain out too hard to eat and after that you have a bag with crumbs in the bottom that I guess is how they make there weight the package I received was very different than advertised I complained but they assured me its the same lol I had it before came vacuumed sealed this pack came full of air and lots of dust I wish I wouldn't have purchased it at one time there product was good but look at there recent reviews all complaining of the same thing fix it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan...
customer_reviews.text: I consider myself an aficionado of jerky having sampled many variations from all over the USA. In my opinion, this may have been the worst jerky I’ve ever eaten. It should be relabeled “jerky brittle”, because it is so dry that it crunches like a hard piece of candy. Between the crunch and the bland flavor it’s just not an enjoyable snack. I only ate one of the three packs and I plan to give the others away.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and easy to eat
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor of the REAL MEAT, and they also put it through a machine that TENDERIZES the meat (like a meat tenderizing hammer that breaks up tough fibers) so it is easy to chew and eat--but it's NOT compressed meat fibers like particle board plywood--it's real meat that's chewy but not tough to tear off a piece when you bit into it. Zooming in on this photo somewhat shows People's Choice Old Fashioned jerkey on the left and how the whole meat slices are softened to break up the fibers, next to other jerkey on the right with long TOUGH fibers that you need to rip apart with your canine teeth so you can chew it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kuz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: So I usually order Wild Bill's beef jerky from Amazon. I saw this beef jerky had 1600 reviews and mostly positive so I decided to try it. Well I got my bag today and it was the most disgusting beef jerky I've ever tasted! If I could give it 0 stars I would.. This was by far the worst beef jerky I've ever had or tasted... Absolutely gross! Not to mention it took them 2 weeks to ship it ... I wouldn't wish this beef jerky on my enemy's... just terrible... I have no idea how they sell so much of this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Killen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but quality control is questionable
customer_reviews.text: I love this jerky and have purchased 20+ of the larger size. Most of the time it is wonderful however occasional I'll get a batch which is bad. It will sometimes contains piece of the wrong flavor (which is an issue when you get a sugar free version and get pieces with sugar). Sometimes the jerky is doubled over on itself so that it's too thick to enjoy. Sometimes it appears a little moldy.. It's a shame since the good batches are so good. I've emailed them about it but get boiler plate responses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too dry even for dry jerky
customer_reviews.text: I generally like the old fashioned dry jerky a lot, but this stuff was not for me. It's dry to the point where it almost crumbles. Most other jerky like this come in thin, flat sheets or flat sticks, but these are crumpled up sticks. It makes them annoying to eat. The flavor of the jerky seems really uneven. Some pieces tasted great, but then too many would have an almost complete absence of whatever spice they put on it. The best thing about this jerky was the cool zip function the bag had on it. Other than that, I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MechaStreisand

customer_reviews.title: This is real jerky
customer_reviews.text: I tried countless mass market brands and always felt they were strangely moist and didn’t taste like the “real” jerky I was used to. Worst of all, those brands would quickly spoil if not refrigerated—which kind of defeats the purpose in my opinion. Now this brand is exactly what I was looking for. It’s dry, with a texture that needs a good chew. The seasoning is subtle and not overpowering, you can really taste the beef. I got the 16 oz bag and it last me a month. It held its freshness the entire time without needing any refrigeration. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: H. Chung

customer_reviews.title: MOLD IN BRAND NEW BAG
customer_reviews.text: I'm repulsed that I've been eating this before noticing. I opened this bag only ONE WEEK ago and th best by date is NEXT YEAR. There is mold on multiple pieces. I noticed a few pieces had some white spots, but this brand was new to me and I thought maybe it was because this jerky is drier, but nope, got towards the middle of the bag and found what was very clearly fuzzy white mold.
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good but now completely dried out
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this jerky many times and before it was always good. Recently they changed the packaging and now the jerky is very dry, as if I'd left the package open for several days. Obviously jerky is a bit dry to begin with; it's not a juicy food. But something bad has happened to this product and it's not really edible now. Hoping they fix it soon but I don't want to buy it again unless there's some way to know it's returned to its previous quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. James

customer_reviews.title: Good seasoning, but VERY fatty...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered due to great reviews...The actual seasoning is pretty delicious... However... Somehow the jerky I received is VERY fatty. The few tiny peices of lean beef in the bag were tasty, but everything else (14+ oz total) tastes like a leftover cooked roast that sat in the fridge for a few days and then I took a bite of the roast cold, rendered resolidified fat and all. The flavor of the fat in it completely turned me off to anything else in the bag, and I cannot eat it.
customer_reviews.author: HeManBeefcake

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok....not Grass fed beef like some reviews have statedd
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on the number and rating of the reviews out there. Quality: 6/10 the jerky is very hard and dry, not too flavorful. Low/no sugar which is nice and no corn syrup or artificial additives. While the beef is sourced from the US it's not grass fed. Grass fed maybe would take it into the more "premium" category, but the taste/consistency is still lacking. Not bad, but I won't purchase this again. To me it feels 50% for human consumption and 50% as dog treats. I'll stick with Whole Foods 365 brand jerky in the future, even though I think they may have some sugar the taste and quality feels much higher.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Keidis

customer_reviews.title: A saltpocolypse
customer_reviews.text: Could we get some meat with that salt? While the texture is perfect (not rock solid, but not mushy like mainstream brands), this product is salted to hell, with at least twice the sodium of the aforementioned store jerky. The manufacturer could definitely benefit from offering a lower sodium version for people who want to taste something other than salt. The packaging is not resealable, sadly, and it makes no fewer than three mentions of the fact that it's made in "Downtown LA." Like that's something to be proud of. Solid 4/5; nailed the texture and hardness, but loses a star for the extreme salt and the lack of resealable packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Squid

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, fair price for quantity and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Really good tasting jerky! Great flavor, you can actually taste the meat because it isn't too salty or covered in spices like most. It's also actually dehydrated, unlike the moist, greasy stuff you can find at convenience stores. They are big pieces and there's lots of it. It is packaged well, but it doesn't look like much in the vacuum package. Once I opened it, and put it in a regular sealed bag I could see how much was actually in it. It arrived in good shape and on time and, even though I didn't need to contact them, the company seems to really care about their customers and their product. I'll be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: ParisJade87

customer_reviews.title: The first batch I ordered was amazing, the second batch was AWFUL (both bags).
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what changed but the first batch I ordered was delicious and on the softer side. The two bags I received recently are so dry and awful--it's more like jerky brittle. I ordered some of these for a relatives birthday and now I'm worried that he received a bad batch too.
customer_reviews.author: MountainClimbingMama

customer_reviews.title: Good, But Not Exactly What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: My dad used to make what he called "Real" jerky, which meant just enough salt to preserve the meat (in this case, venison) and nothing else. No pepper, no garlic, no spices whatsoever, basically what you would have gotten back when jerky was just sun dried meat. It was the kind of thing that you would actually take along in te wilderness as survival food. I have never found commercial jerky made that way, and probably never will. This is good jerky, but not my dad's jerky. It's nice as a snack when you're sitting around watching TV, but not something that. I would want to have to live off of for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Aycock

customer_reviews.title: Best beef jerky for Keto
customer_reviews.text: Just ripped into my first bag of this jerky and, wow! It’s the best! It’s chewy of course but you can actually bite off a piece from a larger slice. Great taste and best of all, NO sugar, which makes it ideal for Keto. My only wish is that it came in a resealable ziplock bag. As much as I would sometimes like to, I’m usually not going to eat all 2.5 ounces at once. Definitely will get this again. Much better than the Keto Carne brand.
customer_reviews.author: mitzu

customer_reviews.title: Not like real old fashioned.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this. I'm old school. Love the old, dry, chewy beef jerky of yesteryear. This, sadly, was not it. It was less expensive (though not cheap) and well packaged, but it was neither like the old-fashioned, nor the new, ultra moist (ugh) you find on store shelves. It was somewhere in between. It had a taste, just not something to write home about. And the texture was more of a dry, crumbly, almost stale like, instead of dry and chewy. Gave it away to a less-discriminating friend. Going back to the (more expensive, but superior) Oklahoma Jerky Company.
customer_reviews.author: Robin B.

customer_reviews.title: People's Choice Beef Jerky - Old Fashioned - Original
customer_reviews.text: Very good, flavorful jerky at a great price. This is not the soft, moist jerky but the tougher leathery kind that takes a bit more effort to chew which I prefer. It works for me as a satisfying late afternoon snack. I have a couple pieces and it carries me through to dinner so the 1 pound bag lasts me 2 or 3 weeks. You'll definitely need some self restraint if you want it to last more than 2 days because it tastes so good. I've tried other jerky on Amazon, some good, some bad but I always come back to PC Old Fashioned because of the value. Please keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Looper34

customer_reviews.title: Very dry & tough. Not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: This jerky is super dry and hard. Some pieces even crack when biting into it. I call this jerky over cooked. The flavor is more like burnt meat than beef jerky. I get dry beef jerky from the Renaissance festival in Maryland and it is good despite being dry. This stuff is too dry. Some people seem to like this stuff, but it is the opposite of what I call tasty/good jerky. I can't give this any more than 1 star because I wasted my money on this. I won't eat it and neither will me kids.
customer_reviews.author: ANON

customer_reviews.title: EUREKA! I finally found ‘real’ beef jerky!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, after reading some bad reviews I was somewhat of a skeptic. DONT listen to them, if, you like real flavor, unprocessed, dry chewy (thick), old school, how beef jerky was made for years. I’ve searched for ‘real’ beef jerky for years, and I’m happy to say I finally found it. This is NOT store bought fake tender processed meat to achieve the perfect non jerky texture. This IS the ‘real’ thing, fresh, with two ingredients, no sugar added to preserve it for long term shelf life like the others.
customer_reviews.author: Oppjopp

customer_reviews.title: Guess I like the plebian jerky....
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a big jerky fan and wanted to try what people were saying was more authentic jerky. I was expecting it to not have that sugary taste that other reviewers were stating is more or less adulterated jerky. I was not expecting the jerky to be as tough and dry as it was however. Long ago, I've made pemmican myself, and I know the end result of that was not so incredibly dry as this product. I was hoping it was going to be moister than it was. Seems like lots of other customers liked this, but this was just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: CheddarisBetter

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the jerky I've been looking for, the one that I used to collect bottles around the neighborhood when I was a kid to earn a little money to go off on my bike to the corner market where they had a jar of foot long strips of beef jerky for 25cents each! ...the price has changed a tad but the taste, the texture, the hardness but still strippable with your teeth, and just enough oil and moisture are still the same as the ones I grew up on! No more Chef's Cut or Jack Links, or even Wild Bills for me - this People's Choice beef jerky is the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Wingsdomain Art and Photography

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinarily great flavor, but very dry
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing I didn't like about this beef jerky except the moisture level. The flavor was a perfect blend of spices, not too much pepper, salt, smoke. Really, an incredibly good flavor. I like that it wasn't pressed processed meat. It appeared to be very thinly sliced real beef. But when I tried to chew off bits of it, I needed a glass of water for help, it was just extremely dry, no hint of fat left in to help lubricate your mouth when trying to chew it. Sawdust is the closest texture I can think of. I was very disappointed because the flavor was so good.
customer_reviews.author: Beve

customer_reviews.title: SALT - so much can make you ill.. Why?
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product many times in the past 3 years. No issues until I ordered the 1lb bag. SALT - so much it could seriously make you sick. This was not normal and I had a few different people try it and it was not just me, every person spit it out, it had that much salt on it. Imagine soaking the beef jerky in water then pouring a whole bottle of salt over it. Yes it was this bad. 1. Bad Batch? 2. Recipe Change? 3. Poor Quality Control - Covid? I did not pay this much to be sent SALT w/ beef. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: This jerky is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a migraineur with food sensitivities including nitrates,nitrites,autolyzed yeast extract and msg. This was the first time I’ve been able to eat jerky in ages because it doesn’t have the usual additives that companies use to cut corners when they produce cheap products. Be advised that you need good teeth because this jerky is very chewy and some pieces are thicker than others. (I love that about it though!)Thank you People’s Choice! I’m one happy customer who’s hoping that this product will be on sale so that I can buy it more often.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, old-school, savory awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! It’s barebones, old school jerky. It’s similar what you might have found hanging on racks hundreds of years ago in indigenous camps. This is for the outdoorsman, the survivalist , the jerky purist. While this sugar-free jerky is anything but sweet and tender, it’s also far from being tough, as it tears easily along the grain. This means that there’s plenty of chew for those of us who enjoy a little gnawing, but not enough to cause jaw ache. The spices are super basic, with enough flavor to be interesting while still allowing the beefy goodness to shine. All in all, this is my kinda jerky. 10 outta 10!
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Totally Keto!
customer_reviews.text: Been on a strict low carb diet for a while and avoided jerky because the packages they sell in the stores are about 7gm of carbs per serving. Then I found People's Choice, decided to give it a go and am I ever glad!! The jerky is delicious, fresh and 0 carbs!! Plus, I love the idea that I am supporting a small, family-owned business. Don't hesitate... BUY THIS JERKY!!
customer_reviews.author: Serenitypond

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says it is:  OLD FASHIONED DELICIOUS JERKY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love jerky - all kinds! What is tremendously unique about this jerky is that is truly old fashioned! It is made the old way - cut by hand and dried. SO, it is NOT the soft, chewy, (somewhat slimy,) jerky you might get from Old Trapper (Which I also like!). THIS jerky is DELICIOUS, but it is old fashioned - so it's NOT soft, NOT chewy, but it's utterly satisfying - especially if you like this style. It's fun to chew on it and its delicious - unique flavor! I'll definitely be re-ordering, it's my go to! (now, if only there was a frequent buyer club......)!
customer_reviews.author: JM5

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for and old fashioned beef jerky without all of the added sugar and flavorings of the "supermarket" brands, then you have found it here. The best way I can describe the flavor, is that it tastes like oven roasted beef. It is drier than the "top" brands, exactly as beef jerky should be in my opinion. In this way, you can take a small slice and chew it and enjoy the flavor over a longer period. I have ordered the 1lb. bag four times so far, and have not been disappointed yet. The quality, and taste has been consistant with each order.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Powell

customer_reviews.title: Jerky:  The Way It Should Be!
customer_reviews.text: This beef jerky is hardy in texture and rich in flavor. People's Choice has the perfect recipe for jerky the way jerky should be : easy to chew yet not full of fatty mouth feel. I bought this for myself because I was on the search for a dryer jerky as opposed to a fatty one. People's Choice filled that bill for me. Since then, I have told several friends about it and I have purchased another bag for my friends at my physical therapy office because two of them are fully Keto and I wanted them to experience this jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Adkisson

customer_reviews.title: Really Good, Minimal Processing
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite beef jerky products. Seasoning is simple, and it comes in big 1 lb bags. The peppered flavor is too sweet for me, and I have been sticking to the Original flavor which is keto-friendly. One thing that bugs me though is that I have had several bags now. Sometimes you get runs that are super greasy with a lot of fat on the pieces (still good) and sometimes the pieces are super-dry and hard. I realize we are dealing with a non-uniform raw product, however, some kind of happy, consistent, medium would be better.
customer_reviews.author: ANG

customer_reviews.title: Not for Wimps - Best Jerky Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Original flavor is the best. There's NO SUGAR in this unlike 95% of all other beef jerky out there. ( I never understood why people want to add sugar to beef jerky) This beef jerky isn't for wimps. I LOVE this beef jerky because it's DRY like beef jerky is supposed to be, and it takes some jaw to rip off a piece. Plus it takes a long time to chew it, which really helps with how long it takes to eat it. 1 oz is 1 serving, but since it's so dry, you get a lot of jerky for 1 Oz. I have bought more of this because I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: For me, this is the good stuff! I finally found the exact flavor & texture of beef jerky from my olden days.
customer_reviews.text: I remember, back in the olden days, I use to walk into a liquor store where I would buy pickled hot dogs and real beef jerky. Ever since then, when I left those streets of old, I could never find those two items ever again. I got stuck with gas station mystery meat that's kinda-sorta-almost, beef jerky. Now with this beef jerky, I finally found the exact flavor & texture of beef jerky from my olden days that I thought were gone forever. For me, this is the good stuff! Thank you to everyone at People's Choice Beef Jerky company for making this amazing product! Once I save up some more money, I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: ¿is legit, si?

customer_reviews.title: Dry dog food.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely L.A. jerky....lol. It's like a bunch of millennial dudes got together and tried their best to make man food. It's a bad attempt at best. 90% of the time it taste like dried dog food but every now and then you'll get a piece that has some seasoning and it's not bad. Overall this stuff smells and taste like what you would consider dog food to taste like. BUT it is keto friendly, and it's a decent price. If you don't care about flavor and just want something low carb to fill your gut then you've got the right product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Real good jerky
customer_reviews.text: This is just good jerky. Eating my first piece reminded me of the variety of jerky. With this one, it is all about flavor and texture. It is a low-moisture jerky with a great mouth feel. Unlike many dry jerkies which are either too tough or too fragile, this jerky tears easily with a satisfying rip. There are no tough tendons or thick plasticky pieces. The flavor is peppery and earthy with a hint of soy sauce. I was unhappy when I saw that the 2.5 oz bags were not resealable. After my first piece, I realized why. I am buying more. This one is going on my recurring order list.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what changed?
customer_reviews.text: This has been our go-to jerky for awhile now. It’s consistently perfectly seasoned and incredibly yummy. The last bag we got was surprisingly not good. Lots of extra fat, gristly and really not very good. We are inclined to continue to order it because they do put out a very good and high quality product, but if our last order is any indication or their future quality, we are abandoning their ship for better jerky. Come on guys, don’t blow a good product by sending out law quality fatty trash.....
customer_reviews.author: Airline Capt

customer_reviews.title: This is our favorite jerky!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite snack. I do not like the “ gas station “ tubes of jerky. Or the stuff at the check out line in the market. This one has great flavor and satisfying chewiness. I have just reordered the one pound bag for the fourth time. The reviewer who posted photos of mold really disturbed me and I would like to read the maker’s response. I have never found mold on any of jerky in the four bags I have received. It is expensive on amazon, but hey, it arrives the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Beachreader42RI

customer_reviews.title: The Jerky I've been looking for all my life
customer_reviews.text: When i was younger my step-father would make beef and deer jerky occasionally using dehydrators and home blend of seasonings. Ever since that time I have always loved jerky but whenever I buy it from the store i get sad because none of the brands are what i am looking for. This however is everything I remember from homemade jerky. The only sweetness from these are from the natural flavor of the meat, they are dry and chewy. Tough but not hard. I cant really describe how happy and excited I was to find this and have been getting all my friends try pieces of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joratcli

customer_reviews.title: Well, I'm hooked on this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have been following my own version of the Keto diet (by that I mean I'm not hard core) and it's working for me. As such while my snack cravings have gone way down I like to have something on hand. I rely some what on Mission Meat sticks but recently a friend brought out some home made deer jerky that was great and that started me craving some good jerky. The stuff at the supermarket usually has too much sugar and other ingredients. This stuff is great for Keto dieters. I like it and I'm sure I will be reordering. Made the mistake of giving a small bite to my cat and now I have to share.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE---WORST BEEF JERKY KNOWN TO MAN
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst food product I have ever purchased....so very dry....no taste at all....like chewing on a piece of rope. THE SMELL IS HORRIBLE!!!...I am shocked this got some decent other ratings. Never ever again. I wonder if my order is a very very old product lying around in warehouse. Looks like a sticker was added on packaging saying product is new??....NO WAY. I do not enjoy making negative comments about anyone or anything, but this has to be told....not fit to eat by anyone or even an animal...it is just that bad......not kidding.
customer_reviews.author: katanaguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’m always in search of “real” beef jerky. Not the chewy, greasy kind in the store that has the consistency of dog treats. I want the dried out stuff and this fits the bill. I have another brand that I prefer, but they’re $15 more than this brand, and the quality is nearly the same so I’m switching to this brand. If you’re looking for “real” old fashioned beef jerky for a fair price that has good taste, look no further. I’ve ordered twice and am satisfied with the quality and taste.
customer_reviews.author: kaya lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Dry but very tasty
customer_reviews.text: This is some of the best regular plain beef jerky I have ever had and I been eating jerky longer then most of you are alive. It’s a very dry jerky so your 1 pound bag of this has more pieces then say some major brands that are sauced or sticky and still have moisture in them. As a result though you must rip, bite or tear a piece off with maybe a little more force and it is very dry at first but let it in your mouth to rehydrate and quickly it will melt and become chewy with a just done right pure beef taste which is all that’s needed.
customer_reviews.author: Taochow

customer_reviews.title: Dry, stale & not edible!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this beef jerky! I was excited to see it was fairly simple & free of a lot of unhealthy ingredients. Unfortunately, this is the worst jerky I’ve ever tasted! It’s cardboard dry, brittle, and just plain terrible. Looks more like alligator skin & a few pieces were even moldy, although the expiration date was 2021. If you’re looking for a delicious jerky, try THINK Jerky. May have a few more ingredients, but grass-fed beef, no antibiotics or hormones & no nitrates.
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, this is the style I’ve been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: HATE Jack Links. Hate any type of “sweet” jerky. And almost all of them are except for this and some “small town/ homemade” jerky I buy online. This jerky has a nice salty flavor, little bit of spice on the backend. Texture is nice and dry, not all gummy and sticky like the aforementioned Jack Link. Sorry Jack, not picking on just you, it’s every brand. This is good stuff, but price wise, it’s exactly the same as the home made stuff I buy, and I tend to like that stuff more. Feel like it could be done cheaper if a guy in his kitchen can pull it off.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: men huddle over my jerky jar like an offensive line down by one point
customer_reviews.text: "Hey is that the stuff from California?".. "Guys check this out. This wasn't made in Texas, it was made in California! Nope, I kid you not. Here, try this!" .. men huddle over my jerky jar like an offensive line down by one point. No one moves from that spot until the jar sits empty. Back to amazon.com with a sigh.. I love this stuff but it never lasts long enough. It makes grocery store beef jerky taste like cardboard.. seriously and literally. Not a speck of fat with superb taste. PCBJ is the congregation point of my mancave.. every single freakin time.. and it's getting expensive.
customer_reviews.author: smb072

customer_reviews.title: Great jerky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jerky for a friend for Christmas. The shipping was fast and the product seems to be of high quality. A couple bits of jerky were crumbled, like they had gotten jostled around at some point during the shipping process. Overall though, great jerky and no complaints. 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: FlowersInSpring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect jerky
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a jerky that was more like what I thought jerky would have been like in the “olden” days. Not the slick, sweet oily, jerky sold that’s full of chemicals, soy, gluten etc. that you find everywhere today. Also, The smell is awful when you open the bag. Peoples Choice is the jerky I’ve been looking for. Dry, not sweet, not greasy and doesn’t stink when the bag is opened. All natural ingredients. Comes as close to my perception of what jerky would have been in the old days. I’ll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: fogerty

customer_reviews.title: People's Choice Beef Jerky - Old Fashioned and sugar free
customer_reviews.text: I discovered People's Choice Beef Jerky a couple years ago and since then it is the only brand that I have bought. I like it because it does not have a lot of other things added to it and that it is sugar free. It reminds me of the jerky that I use to get back in the sixties. I would highly recommend People's Choice Beef Jerky to anyone who enjoys jerky, they have flavors to meet anyone taste, needs and everyone that I have dealt with there seems to be very friendly and helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Roush

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Stale and Flavorless
customer_reviews.text: I bought a number of jerky's recently from Amazon that I would consider more authentic jerky. Unless I just got a bad batch, I don't understand the reason for all the positive reviews. The jerky tastes stale and is flavorless, which actually goes hand in hand when it comes to jerky. The Hardtimes jerky, while more expensive, is a better option. I haven't tried the other flavors of People's Choice Jerky, which I am hesitant to do because of so many reviews (pictures) showing moldy jerky. Maybe this brand is just a crapshoot, and you never know what you are going to get. I'll probably never know, $30 is too much to take a chance that it might be edible.
customer_reviews.author: Jayski J

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: The first bag I ordered was perfect old fashioned jerky. Dry, required lots of chewing, perfect. The second bag was really fatty with huge chunks of fat clinging to most of the pieces. Even with the fat removed, the jerky was really greasy and a the taste was a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn

customer_reviews.title: Not your grocery store jerkey!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and opened up vacuum sealed package and placed in Ziploc bag. It's more than I thought so it will last a while thankfully. I just tried a piece and it is not like any jerkey I've had before... It's better. This one is just peppered and it's not over powering pepper. It's semi dry with no fake moisture properties or other fake flavoring. It just taste like pure beef and doesn't wear your jaw out chewing. It breaks of quite easily but it's not brittle, just easy to bite off a piece. I'm really impressed and glad I bought this. I will buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This tastes like COW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tastes like cow!!! THat may sound like a rub, but it's not. This is what jerky is supposed to taste like. All the jerky I find in the stores is covered in sugar or teriyaki sauce. I have no desire to have my jerky covered in a bunch of sugary flavored crap. This is what you're looking for if you love jerky, but hate all that store bought excuse for jerky. Thanks, People's Choice. Keep up the good work. I just ordered almost all your other flavors. I avoided the ones that had fruit or sugar.
customer_reviews.author: T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: A little bland
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of the jerky was a little bland. I wasn't expecting a hot version of jerky that I generally prefer because it was not advertised as such, but I wanted to try this product because of the amount I could order at one time and the fact that there was no sugar used in the drying process. The texture, freshness, and presentation of the jerky was fine and it was obvious that I was eating real, not processed and reformed beef. If I could suggest anything for this product, it would be the need step up the flavor profile, so I don't feel like I'm just chewing dried meat and nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Kupfer

customer_reviews.title: Dry chewy authentic jerky! Flavor lacking a bit though
customer_reviews.text: Texture and appearance is great (unlike jack links wet and sticky jerky) but it’s lackimg a little in the flavor department. Taste like salt mostly with a little spice. My son says it taste like hamburger meat. It’s not bad but it’s not the best. Ralph’s jerky is still the best! If you can find Ralph’s then buy it! I don’t think I’ll buy the original flavor again but I might try the other flavors. If you don’t like really dry jerky then you won’t like this. But when you buy the wet stuff you’re paying for water and less beef. This bag is huge though unlike jack links.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Our Family's Absolute Favorite Beef Jerky
customer_reviews.text: Our Family has been buying People's Choice Beef Jerky for at least 35 years since my Sons were little. They've grown up on this beef Jerky - and love it - and My Daughter-in-law did some research and found out it was People's Choice Jerky. So now we don't have to travel 90 miles to pick some up - it's close by at their location in Los Angeles and now also on Amazon. This is the absolute best beef jerky on the market. Thick & Fresh and oh so delicious! I highly recommend this Jerky to anyone who loves beef jerky. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: K. Leon

customer_reviews.title: REAL BEEF JERKY RIGHT HERE!
customer_reviews.text: What I loved about this beef jerky is that it is real beef jerky, it’s NOT beef candy, zero sugar or sweeteners! It is NOT soft and moist, it’s dry as a bone(the way jerky should be)! This is the kind of jerky a boy could put in his pocket and save for later. The real McCoy right here! The flavor is out of this world, just enough salt, you can actually taste the beef. I highly recommend this jerky to anyone who appreciates “OLD FASHION” jerky. If you like the sweet moist stuff, this isn’t for you.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: This Is No Pansy Cityboy Sugared Jerky!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't be the only beef jerky fan who HATES SUGAR!! Sugar belongs in candy and ice cream, but NOT in dried beef! Thus, you can see why I was delighted to discover People's Choice. It's good old fashioned jerky dried almost to the point of brittleness after being delightfully seasoned with the basics of salt and black pepper, just as the good Lord originally meant beef jerky to be. The taste and texture leave nothing to be desired. If you love real beef jerky and hate sissified cityboy sugared cardboard, you will LOVE this jerky!!
customer_reviews.author: nightwind

customer_reviews.title: Different, but good!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I was not prepared for this "real" or "authentic" beef jerky. I was used to buying the soft, chewy kind. I even thought there was something wrong with the bag I received. So I read a little more into it and realized it was exactly as it was supposed to be. It is tough but as one reviewer advised, the more you chew, the more flavor that got released. It took me a while to get used to it. The only complaint I have is that most of my bag was tiny pieces and nothing like the picture. I do like bigger pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger L.

customer_reviews.title: Responsive merchant
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE, I WAS CONTACTED BY THE MERCHANT WHO WAS VERY CONCERNED ABOUT MY EXPERIENCE AND MADE EFFORTS TO CORRECT THE SITUATION. This product was expensive and the quality of it was not worth the price. There were so many white strips attached to the meat that I had no idea what it was, I pulled it out of my mouth because it wasnt chewable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting beef jerky
customer_reviews.text: This tastes great and since it doesn't contain sugar, it's perfect for low carb / high protein diet snacks. It is exactly as described so don't expect something that you can just byte off like sausage snacks. I cut the strips into 1" pieces then chew gently until they soften after a few seconds. It is definitely worth the wait. If I was really old school I'd just chew on the end of a strip but small pieces in a custard cup seems tidier.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: BEST in class jerky AND customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This jerky is BY FAR the best I've had since Hickory Farms years ago!! It is not "chopped and formed". It is REAL Beef with real grain and texture. The flavor is addicting and delicious WITHOUT sugar!! Perfect for the Keto/Paleo diet. I really like it when I'm at work and need/want a snack. The chewiness is very satisfying. I am on my THIRD bag and will be ordering more. There was a post office error and these folks made it up. No hassle what so ever. STELLAR CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. C.

customer_reviews.title: Winner in my view of packaged beef jerky!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the top 3 best reviewed brands of jerky. Peoples, Old Trapper and Wild Bills. Long story short The Peoples brand won out my favorite. All three were good for a variety of reasons but overall Peoples is my favorite. Pros. Dry. makes less of a mess. No weird after or during taste. Being dyer you get a little more for your money. Cons. Dry. tougher. some people don't desire this type of jerky. Only comes in small packs.
customer_reviews.author: JLSmith

customer_reviews.title: Oh my God, I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying that this is AMAZINGLY delicious. The very simple blend of spices makes it hard to stop eating! It's also healthier than a lot of the other jerky sold by other companies, so that's totally a plus. I love that it's tougher and drier than the beef jerky you find in the stores as well - not overly so, either - and I grew up on homemade jerky, so I'm very accustomed to this. Oh, and I wasn't expecting a resealable bag for the 1lb bag - what a friggen plus! I'm so happy I found this brand - I'll be ordering more in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Ester

customer_reviews.title: This product reminds me of the old-fashioned beef jerky of the good old days
customer_reviews.text: Beef jerky you buy at Costco or the supermarket nowadays is not the same as the stuff sold when I was a kid. This product reminds me of the old-fashioned beef jerky of the good old days. Like others have mentioned, the cut of beef they use for this jerky must be fattier because the strips can get a bit greasy, but it's still the best jerky I've had in a long, LONG while. My family went crazy over this stuff and finished the bag in 3 days! Added plus is the no sugar, no added preservatives (except salt). Definitely plan to order more, because it's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: The Best Jerky
customer_reviews.text: This is by far some of the best jerky I've ever had. It's natural without all the crap and extra ingredients people put in their jerky. I purchased the hot and spicy and the plain for a vacation road trip. We've been digging into the bags before our trip occurs because it's just that good. I am now a forever customer. The jerky is sealed in a very heavy duty zip locked bag and has been staying fresh. I highly recommend to anyone on a carnivore or keto diet to purchase and enjoy with NO guilt.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E Cordes

customer_reviews.title: Gives those jaw bone muscles a work out!
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical from other reviews of staleness, dried out, etc, but this stuff is the real deal. Not the gas station mass produced stuff, but authentic beef jerky. Different textures, different shapes and sizes, and the flavor not overkill with processed fake ingredients. Has a nice hint of pepper and it is addicting. Bought it for myself but noticing the bag is getting lighter and lighter so my kids are enjoying it too! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Keath W. Otis

customer_reviews.title: The real deal.
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how difficult it is to find jerky or bacon with no added sugar or other sweeteners, and that includes the so-called organic and natural brands. Even the "high-end-healthy" specialty food stores in my area (Portland,OR) did not carry any jerky-style meats that were really low-carb-friendly. Great taste and texture, however this stuff is not the typical commercial "soft and chewy" jerky, so your jaw may get a bit of a workout but boy, is it worth it. Feels like you're eating jerky made by American natives or pioneers, like I said in the title, this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: iXlad66

customer_reviews.title: <3 Paleo Protein Drug of Choice! <3
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE!! Since I started eating Whole30 and paleo I have been an avid lover of this jerky. I found it while searching for a sugar free jerky. With my first order I fell in love and have bee reordering for over a year. My boyfriend even knew to order some and put it in my birthday bundle of snacks! I occasionally let others try a piece (because I usually won't share) and preface it with, "this jerky is the kobe beef of jerky." It's amazing and I love it. I'm a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Snack
customer_reviews.text: I have been do Keto for almost 4 months. Down 37 lbs and I don't see that its a diet at all, its a change of how and what you eat. This beef jerky is truly an awesome snack during the day. I like that it is dried, and a little salty, (but we need that). It also makes me drink more water, which is a huge plus. I like the plain white package, and the fact that I can just put a few slices in a baggie and it lasts the day.
customer_reviews.author: beckashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've tried many different brands of jerky - some I liked, some not so much, but I have to say that your product is excellent. I was somewhat surprised considering it's from downtown LA - not exactly where I would expect beef jerky to be made, but source aside it's a VERY tasty product and one I'll be buying again. The only request I will make is that larger pieces would be preferred but that's just my preference. As is it is exactly what I've been looking for. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Longtime Customer

customer_reviews.title: OLD SCHOOL JERKY
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review as I wait for my 5th and 6th bags of this delicious jerky to arrive at my house. This jerky is OLD SCHOOL style, as in you rip into it and chew, it isn't that soft serve stuff that kinda just melts in your mouth. No extra sugar in this, and did I say delicious? Well it is. And bonus my GF doesn't like it as much as I do, so more for me. My only gripe is that it doesn't come in the slab form. C'Mon People's Choice!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: This is really good
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pound for my wife who LOVES quality beef jerky. And while we've tried several top rated ones over the years we have found People's Choice to be the BEST. I don't get to eat much of it (my wife hordes it), but the few bites I ate were easy to chew yet firm, full of flavor yet not overly salty or seasoned (like many others), and the chewing brought out rich "eating steak" nuances. Like a fine wine this jerky is one to savor. And the pricing was very fair (thanks for that).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and not at all tough like so many other brands are. The texture is similar to higher on the hog bacon. The taste is amazing, great minimal ingredient list, very easy on a delicate stomach and very high protein. A single bag is 66% of your daily protein. I was briefly concerned that the bag was not resealable, but that ceased to be a concern after 5 minutes. There is no need for resealable (that would only increase cost) an open bag won't last more than 4.9 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: SF IoT Geek

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good...
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice and dry enough but has a really odd gamey flavor (can't smell it - only taste it). I had to dehydrate and salt/pepper the entire pack. After that, it was delicious but it shouldn't have been this way. Not sure why packaging is a criteria for rating; really silly. *EDIT** - I tried a second batch.. this one isn't gamey.. Increased by 1 star.. if it was a tad thicker, it would be nice
customer_reviews.author: Alive and Well

customer_reviews.title: People's Choice is my choice...when I can afford it
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality and texture of this jerky, especially the original. The taste is awesome and I like how it fits paleo diets. The only negative is the price. I originally bought the individual packs to see if I even liked it if I got a pound. When I purchased the pound, I also realized it takes longer, and the delivery date kept getting pushed back, which is frustrating. Overall, I love the product, just not the price, so it is more like a special treat for me.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Resealable bag really works
customer_reviews.text: As I write this I am chewing on a piece of Beef Jerky. I buy the original Old fashioned. 16 ounce size. It tastes good, the texture is hard but not to hard, very chewable. Create in between meal snack, helps you avoid all the sugary crap we are always being tempted by, I even use it as treat for my Pit bull. :') But I don't give her that much, because it's mine, all MINE! I am a repeat buyer and the quality is always top notch.
customer_reviews.author: DeployGuy

customer_reviews.title: Better than the ad
customer_reviews.text: Reading the description sold me in trying this jerky But when I got the package I was impressed it’s not that small bag you see in the stores but a huge bag with good weight Opening it up you get a pleasant beef smell and the taste is awesome very beefy and a great chew I’ll be adding it to my subscription Well done, I have been looking for this taste and texture for a long time... you nailed it
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: The best traditional beef Jerky available that is Not loaded with preservatives
customer_reviews.text: I found this jerky after trying various others. If you are looking for traditional jerky without a lot of added stuff, then this is the one. Because it a pond and I consumed over a couple of weeks, I noticed them dry out a bit towards the end, if not kept in sealed package. Recently they have changed packaging and took care of that issue too. Now it is more convenient and ho hassle to keep it sealed after taking some out. I love the taste and there is no overpowering seasoning. I love it! One thing that I found out by chance - Even when it is not in prime, no shipping charge if I order 4 packs !
customer_reviews.author: satheesh george

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Jerky
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it was perfect! The People's Choice Beef Jerky - Old Fashioned Original was exactly as described. The jerky did not taste sweet. The meat was of excellent quality and did not have fat. It tastes great and does not have nasty chemicals. I was especially thrilled that it does not contain MSG. In an ongoing search for the way jerky used to be, I've encountered disappointing jerky which had a fake, sweet taste. It would have visible fat. My search is over. People's Choice Beef Jerky - Old Fashioned Original is the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Knit

customer_reviews.title: It's a No for me. Plain dried meat. I needed more flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love jerky. I was excited to try but it falls very short in the flavor Dept for me. It tastes like plain dehydrated beef. No seasoning, not even salty... Just. Plain. Meat. Also, many pieces are noted to be obviously fatty and as such, kinda soft. The ingredients say garlic, sea salt, and seasoning. I'd venture say they may have waved seasoning over the product but there's was not enough to flavor the meat. It's not bad by any means just very plain dried meat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like I used to make, only easier!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very much more real and less processed than the big brands. Nice mix of cuts against and with the grain, very nice mild flavor. Some pieces make you work for it, some not as much. Best alternative to making my own and as good as the old school Robertson’s I used to buy from a little meat place in Oklahoma (this is cheaper too). Found my go to jerky and will be gifting some in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Moosepuck

customer_reviews.title: They will do right by you...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought, perhaps a dozen or so bags of delicious jerky from the good folks at People's Choice Beef Jerky and I have only had one batch that would not meet standards. Once I notified them, they quickly and positively responded to replace the product, to which I was delighted to receive, as this is some mighty fine jerky, even if it's from the left coast. I recently ordered a couple of bags as birthday gifts and the recipients were thrilled with their gifts. Thanks Brian! You are developing a devoted following! -M
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Rename it to "The Best Damn Jerky Ever!"
customer_reviews.text: I received a one pound bag in my Christmas stocking this year. It was my Keto snack. I'm a Paramedic, and need something to go that's protein packed. It didn't make it past three shifts, so I ordered another one pound bag, and it made it through three shifts again. The taste, texture and moisture levels are spot on. Delicious, and nutritious! Will be ordering another bag shortly. Thanks for making an AWESOME product!
customer_reviews.author: Medic233

customer_reviews.title: Superb!!
customer_reviews.text: I love beef jerky and took a chance on this one without seeing it first. I was very, very pleased. If you like your jerky to be moist and kept in the refrigerator then this is not for you. This jerky is what jerky is suppose to be like. Some thing you can take on a hike and not worry about it spoiling. The flavor is great as well. This is in addition to what I wrote before. I love this jerky so much that I have placed another order. I love this stuff! I have to admit that I have shared a few pieces with my dogs as well. They give it two paws up!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Groves

customer_reviews.title: Not again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a big bag of this to share with my co workers. It arrives took ages to get here and when it showed up it was terrible. Not sure if they messed the spicing up on that batch but, 6 people who all tried it didn't like it. I them left the bag on my desk and the approx a week later I had a few coworkers who hasn't tried go and try some. They showed up to the meeting and there was fuzz all over it. It has molded and was furry b
customer_reviews.author: Parker St. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Try It !!
customer_reviews.text: At first, since I am used to the processed flavor of good jerky, this caught me off guard with the clean taste, no aftertaste and overall zero additive effect. Did not take long, half a bag later and I am a fan. Little $$, but, hey, this stuff ain't cheap, it is well worth your purchase, especially as an alternative/comparative experience. I'll confirm the quality effort, you decide the A's to yea or nea-- bet it's yea!
customer_reviews.author: Vic V.

customer_reviews.title: The Best and Only Real Jerky!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for an old fashioned jerky like this since I used to buy strips from a jar on the counter at a Chinese run corner store at Jones near Filbert in SF,Ca. 15 cents a piece to go with their amazing fresh Larraburu sourdough roll very thin sliced, dried out correctly salami and cheese sandwiches for 35 cents with a bag of Laura Scudders BBQ chips. This is the homemade taste of 1963 San Francisco!
customer_reviews.author: Dr StrangeSpock

customer_reviews.title: Too much grease and fat...
customer_reviews.text: This is the greasiest beef jerky I've ever had. When you bite down on certain pieces you can feel the grease come out. It's also fatty. The overall flavor is ok if you can get past all the fat and grease....it's almost like they fried it...
customer_reviews.author: JTobs

customer_reviews.title: Great Value compared to all others!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the picture looks like it is coated in red spices. The jerky I got is NOT red at all. It is really not spicy, but it has a great flavor! It is obvious that Amazon is not the best place to buy food products (price-wise), but this jerky is better priced than any other I seen on Amazon so far. YOU GET WAY MORE FOR YOUR MONEY & IT IS A LITTLE DRY, BUT AWESOME FLAVOR! I REALLY, REALLY like that it is NOT SWEET & STICKY, like most other jerkys. Pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Paul P.

customer_reviews.title: Just like a fast food picture.. you won't get what you see here
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this order. The picture showed thick, wide strips of lean meat that looked like bacon. What I received was more like flat shoe-laces and all but black like charcoal. The flavor isn't too bad and only has a mild after-taste but this was supposed to be a break-out-bag for multiple bug-out bags. If only what I purchased looked like the logo I would have given it one more star. Truth in advertising?
customer_reviews.author: J. David Green

customer_reviews.title: Just like real TEXAS jerky!
customer_reviews.text: Best Jerky I've ever had next to the Jerky I would buy at a family owned an operated pit stop along US Highway 59 in Texas. I wanted jerky that wasn't full of unnecessary preservatives or sugar. Jerky that had the texture it's supposed to have, not that rubbery jerky you buy in the grocery store that is full of crap and sugar. Real Jerky doesn't need that! I will continue to buy this jerky as long as it's available!
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: True old fashioned jerky
customer_reviews.text: This is authentic jerky. This is excellent jerky. True bite, pull and chew. Not the over spiced, over sweetened and over processed jerky from the large companies usually found on grocery shelves. I have had numerous jerky brands over the years. This jerky ranks in my top five. Real beef taste just a hint of spices and nice texture on the dry side. If you prefer true old fashioned jerky this jerky is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Craigmed

customer_reviews.title: Ketogenic Compatible - Excellent Flavor and Texture!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of the Beef Jerky products that do not have added sugars and other undesirable ingredients and this is by far the best I've tried. The flavor AND texture are great and what you expect in quality Beef Jerky...unlike the competing brands widely available. My wife likes this as much as I do and the convenience of 16 ounce packaging is an added bonus. Great company and product!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Simply Put: BEST Real Beef Jerky
customer_reviews.text: This is the only beef jerky anyone should buy; it's real meat with real ingredients. I am an avid fan of jerky, I've had over 20 different brands and different types. I have even made my own several times. This is savory and not sweet. Its firm and not chewy. It tastes like a steak, I honestly cant figure out how they make it so good without making it overly salty etc. I buy these by the pound now. Great job Peoples Choice!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product.  At least for a real jerky lover.
customer_reviews.text: I am use to home made jerky by friends and family. I really did not find this jerky great in flavor. I did find it very oily or fatty. This jerky was not for me. I literally threw it out. All I have too say it was not what I expected and I found a lot of the reviews very incorrect. But that is probably because a lot of buyers never really had old fashioned jerky. I should have read where it was made. Sorry I am from Western Ny where we still make venison jerky.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: If you prefer jerky that is tender enough to bite through easily but dry enough it feels like real beef jerky
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems initially with the shipping but the company worked hard to ensure I finally received my order. Once it arrived I can say it was well worth the wait. If you prefer jerky that is tender enough to bite through easily but dry enough it feels like real beef jerky, this product finds a perfect balance. Not so sinewy that you can't bite through it, and not so moist it feels mushy or like a processed product. This flavor is great if you prefer jerky that has a more salty, meaty taste. Extremely pleased with both the product and the customer service. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: anisonam

customer_reviews.title: Yum! The best thing to come out of Los Angeles besides me! LOL
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the packaged I was surprised as to how paper-stiff the beef jerky was until I tried one, then another and another! My husband reacted in the same way. Even my Yorkie enjoyed the pieces I gave her, knowing it was 100% beef. Great taste and texture. Will definitely continue to purchase this beef jerky because it not only tastes very good but the fact that it is 100% beef with NO SUGAR making it a healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: This is what beef jerky should be.
customer_reviews.text: This is what beef jerky should be: simple, natural, high quality ingredients. Not an over-sugared, chemically moistened, nitrate-laden horror food. Beef jerky is food that is simple to make, yet surprisingly hard to find simply made. And that's what this is; a simple food, surprisingly well made.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

product_meta.title: People's Choice Beef Jerky - Old Fashioned - Original - Healthy, Sugar Free, Zero Carb, Gluten Free, Keto Friendly, High Protein Meat Snack - Dry Texture - 2.5 Ounce, 1 Bag (Pack of 3)
feature_bullets: DRY & TOUGH JERKY NOT FOR EVERYONE - We craft an authentic, old-fashioned style jerky. Thick cut and dried in whole strips, this jerky has a chewy, steak-like texture; not that soft stuff. Taste the real meat flavor in each bite
PERFECT SNACK FOR KETOGENIC, LOW CARB, PALEO, ATKINS, LCHF DIET - Each serving of our world famous jerky is Sugar Free (0g), Carb Free (0g), and High in Protein (16g)

GUILT FREE SNACKING - This premium snack boasts No Nitrites or Nitrates, No MSG, No Preservatives, No Artificial Ingredients. We guarantee our jerky is 100% Gluten Free, Soy Free, and Nut Free. It's nothing more than Meat, Water, and Natural Spices

SMALL BATCH MADE IN THE USA - We are a family-owned and operated business, celebrating over 90 year and 4 generations of tradition in Los Angeles, CA. Just like your favorite homemade, delicious jerky the longer you chew the more flavor you enjoy

BUILT FOR AN ACTIVE LIFESTYLE - Natural energy perfect for on-the-go snacking while camping, hiking, body building, backpacking. Perfect grocery item for your pantry or school lunch bag. Stash some in your desk drawer as the best office snack
